abstract: Interview with Stephen J Rapp, former United States attorney and international prosecuter, who offers candid insight into international criminal justice system and necessity of prosecuting Islamic State militants, government of Syrian Pres Bashar al-Assad and Syrian rebel groups for war crimes.
lead_paragraph: Stephen Rapp said it would be “unthinkable” to do without a process of justice in the future for any peace agreement to have the support of the Syrian people.

headline.main: Veteran International Prosecutor Foresees War Crimes Trials for ISIS
headline.print_headline: Veteran U.S. Lawyer Foresees War Crimes Trials for ISIS

snippet: Stephen Rapp said it would be “unthinkable” to do without a process of justice in the future for any peace agreement to have the support of the Syrian people.
